mapper.insert: insert into service (SERVICE_ID, SERVICE_NBR, SERVICE_NAME, SERVICE_CONTENT, SERVICE_TYPE_ID, EXT_SERVICE_ID, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values (#{serviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{serviceNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{serviceTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{extServiceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update service set SERVICE_NBR = #{serviceNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_NAME = #{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_CONTENT = #{serviceContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_TYPE_ID = #{serviceTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, EXT_SERVICE_ID = #{extServiceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SERVICE_ID = #{serviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select SERVICE_ID, SERVICE_NBR, SERVICE_NAME, SERVICE_CONTENT, SERVICE_TYPE_ID, EXT_SERVICE_ID, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from service where SERVICE_ID = #{serviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select SERVICE_ID, SERVICE_NBR, SERVICE_NAME, SERVICE_CONTENT, SERVICE_TYPE_ID, EXT_SERVICE_ID, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from service

select SERVICE_ID, SERVICE_NBR, SERVICE_NAME, SERVICE_CONTENT, SERVICE_TYPE_ID, EXT_SERVICE_ID, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from service where SERVICE_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{serviceName}),'%')
